content: **about design** *claudine* is a collar that can be worn in your favourite sweater the cowl is worked top down in round it is a perfect gift *claudine* was designed with those odd balls and leftover skeins of fingering weight yarn and mohair we all have in our stashes but it can also be worked in a single strand of dk weight yarn **material** 1 strand of knitting for olive merino 250m 1 ball held together with 1 strand of knitting for olive soft silk mohair 225m 1 ball sample in merino oatmeal colorway and soft silk mohair marzipan or merino cream + soft silk mohair cream circular needles 4 mm with a cable of at least 60cm + one 40cm 1 sewing needle 1 marker **infos** the little cowl measures approximately diameter 43cm to 80 cm these dimensions are given after blocking **gauge** 24 sts and 28 rounds of lace pattern needle 4mm after blocking **errata** written instructions r9 * k1 yo k5 p3 **k5** yo repeat from * to end of round instructions écrites r9 * 1m end 1 jeté 5m end 3m env **5m end** 1 jeté répéter de * jusqu à la fin du rang tour *** **free patterns are for personal use only no help will be provide ** **thank you for your understanding **les patrons gratuits sont à usage personnel uniquement** ** **aucune aide ne sera apportée à leurs réalisations merci de votre compréhension **
